name: Easter Egg
description:
Two teams, up to 8 players, compete to capture the Easter Egg while defending their team with abilities. The time limit for a match is 5 minutes. There are two goals; capturing the Easter Egg, then bringing it back to the home while defending your teammates.





  • Two unique character types and as equal gameplay features,
  • Competitive Gameplay,
  • Different game modes such as Ranked, Quick or Private Match,
  • 2-8 player,
  • Level & Ranking,
  • Awesome forest design, completely equally designed for both teams,
  • Day, Night and Sunset,
  • Boosting and Power-Ups for both character type,
  • You can set up a party to join matches with friends,

Power-Ups for both character type such as:

  • Freezer is freezing the opposite team players for 3 seconds.
  • Lightning makes a lightning cloud that is striking to the opposite team players for 3 seconds.
  • Anvil is to creating anvil on the back of the opposite team players for slowing down 8 seconds.
  • Power Shield is to create a powerful shield that protects the player against power-ups for 15 seconds.
  • Purify Power is purifying power-up effects on the player.
  • Egg Bomb Explode the Easter Egg and stun the opposite team player which is carrying or near the Easter Egg.
  • Double Up Double up the Easter Egg and gain 2 scores instead of 1 when bringing it back to the home in 20 seconds.





  • More Maps,

  • Character customization,

  • Different game modes,

  • Playing against AI,

  • More language support.
